Enter a unique name and the desired options for this mailing list. The options below are specific to the Mailing List Type. For standard lists, leave the "Source" field at zero.
Select a mailing List from the following list. Enter the required paramaters as defined below.

Click the "Help" link above for a detailed description of each mailing list's parameters and return values.
Enter the specific Custom List number. You can enter up to five parameters for the selected Custom List. See the Custom List documentation for parameter options.

Select one of the following User Defined List types. You can select up to three extra fields that can be included in the email subject and message. You can define up to three conditions to filter the list of email addresses.
Is Equal To
Is Not Equal To
Is Less Than
Is Greater Than
Is Less or Equal To
Is Greater or Equal To
Starts With
Contains
Does Not Contain

Or

Ascending

Click the Mailing List name below to edit. New mailing lists can be defined by clicking the "New Mailing List" link in the upper right hand corner of this page.
